about_the_game:
Burning Skies is a frantic roguelite bullet hell. Join the resistance and assemble the ultimate warjet, shoot take down giant bosses and avoid many dangers to destroy the tyrants who are ruling the world.

THE ULTIMATE WARJET

Assemble your jet with ulocked pieces and upgrade it during the run with stackable upgrades, weapons, special attacks, drones or defemsive asset and try to take down the may challenges ahead!

TAKE DOWN MULTIPLE BOSSES

In Burning Skies you'll fight multiple challenging and unique boss fights each of them with it's own visuals and attack patterns, do you have what it takes to beat them all?

THE RESISTANCE

Mankind has been subdued by general Bloodmester and his warmachines and you are mankind's last hope in getting freedom back.

EACH RUN IS UNIQUE

With procedurally generated maps, modifiers, dozens of enemies and multiple bosses, each run will be unique! But you'll keep xp that can be used to unlock pieces to improve your aircraft!
